name: Whoogle
short_description: Self-hosted, ad-free Google search proxy with privacy features and customization options.
description: Whoogle is a self-hosted search proxy that fetches Google search results and presents them without ads, tracking, or clutter. It provides a clean, privacy-focused search experience while using Google's search algorithm. Features include no ads or tracking, customizable themes (dark, light, separator), config filters, language and region customization, HTML/DJSON/TXT export options, safe search toggle, and the ability to use as your default search engine. It's the simplest way to search Google privately - your searches never directly hit Google's servers from your IP.
usecases: Search Google without ads or tracking from your IP address.
Set as your browser's default search engine for privacy.
Customize search appearance with themes and filters.
notes: Proxies Google search - results come from Google's algorithm
No tracking cookies or IP logging
Can be customized with environment variables
